instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME: Implement the 'Smart Campus Indigo' theme. Use the specific Tailwind classes provided in 'colors'.
2. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Don't just stack divs. Use the grid-cols-12 system.
3. COMPONENTS: Use the provided Shadcn components in /components/ui. Customize them with the classes in 'components' section.
4. MOCK AUTH: Create a simple login form. Any email/password combination should redirect to the dashboard. Store a dummy 'user' object in localStorage or Context.
5. REPORT FORM: Make it a 'Wizard' or a clean single-page form. Use the 'Glassmorphism' style for the container.
6. ADMIN TOGGLE: Place this prominently (e.g., top right). It should instantly switch the view state and reveal the 'Admin Stats' bento grid.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, toggles) as per the rules.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered layouts everywhere.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Give content room to breathe.
Micro-interactions: Add hover:scale-[1.02] to cards and active:scale-95 to buttons.
Dark Mode: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast in dark mode. Use slate-400 for muted text, not slate-600.
No 'Transparent' Backgrounds: Always use a blur or a solid color for dropdowns and headers.
